trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Bloomington
There were no other sightings in Bloomington on or around April 11th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside around 9:25 waiting for a ride. Noticed lighted object in the sky toward ESE. It looked like a burning plane or firework remnant. Was travelling nearly straight down toward 5 o clock position at freefall speed.I lost sight of it behind trees and buildings before it reached ground level however. 40 minutes later I noticed a low flying helicopter in a neighborhood near that area as well.
Summary: I was facing ESE object appeared to be falling nearly straight down
